tool_description: Extracts comprehensive ticket information including metadata, content, customer details, and current status from the ticket management system.

ticket_id.description: Unique identifier for the support ticket

include_history.description: Whether to include full interaction history

error_messages: Ticket not found: The provided ticket_id does not exist in the system. Verify the ticket ID is correct.
Access denied: Insufficient permissions to access this ticket. Contact administrator for access rights.
System unavailable: Ticket management system is temporarily unavailable. Retry after a few minutes.
usage: Provide a valid ticket_id to extract ticket information. Set include_history to true if you need the complete interaction timeline for escalation analysis.
